name: CMIOExtensionStreamSource
desc: A protocol for objects that act as stream sources.

items.name: var formats: [CMIOExtensionStreamFormat]
items.desc: An array of formats that a stream supports.

items.name: class CMIOExtensionStreamFormat
items.desc: An object that describes the format of a media stream.

items.name: var availableProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>
items.desc: A set of properties available for the stream.

items.name: func streamProperties(forProperties: Set<CMIOExtensionProperty>) -> CMIOExtensionStreamProperties
items.desc: Gets the states of specified properties.

items.name: func setStreamProperties(CMIOExtensionStreamProperties)
items.desc: Sets the property state of a stream.

items.name: func authorizedToStartStream(for: CMIOExtensionClient) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines whether to authorize an app to use this stream.

items.name: func startStream()
items.desc: Starts the stream of media data.

items.name: func stopStream()
items.desc: Stops the stream of media data.
